alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 3:06PM EST until January 02 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and sleet then all snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches for a storm total of 1 to 3 inches and sleet accumulations of between one and two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Central Penobscot, Northern Washington and Southern Piscataquis Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM EST this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and sleet means periods of snow and sleet will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southern Piscataquis
